snippet: KATZ--Michael A. Jan. 2, 1946 - Dec. 20, 2002 There is a grief that cannot be spoken. Beloved husband of Margaret. Adored father of Joshua and Jonathan. Father-in-law of Rachel. Grandfather to Sacha, Michael and Marisol Katz. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KATZ--Michael A. Jan. 2, 1946 - Dec. 20, 2002 There is a grief that cannot be spoken. Beloved husband of Margaret. Adored father of Joshua and Jonathan. Father-in-law of Rachel. Grandfather to Sacha, Michael and Marisol Katz. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  KATZ, MICHAEL A
